lines.text: But you haven't done anything! You're innocent!
Once you do a stretch, you're never clean again! You're never free! They've always got a string on you, and they tug, tug, tug! Before you know it, you're back again!

You know, it isn't what a man wants to do, Lacey, but what he has to do. Now take me - I love to smoke cigarettes, but the doctors say I can't have them. So what do I do? I chew toothpicks, tons of them.
How come the smart guys are inside and the dopes outside?
Think about that wife of yours, Steve. You can't afford to make any mistakes.
People. They accept the love of a dog, and when it gets old and sick they say put it to sleep.
